g.aria-label: X-axis titled 'Percentage' for a linear scale with values from 0 to 100
Y-axis titled 'Religion' for a discrete scale with 12 values: Muslims, Protestants, Pagan/earth-based, Native Am. Spirituality, Jews, ending with Hindus
